title: typeface on cindering logo
author: jilljill

comments.content:
Appears to be Titillium, a free Google web font:  
 [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Titillium+Web](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317173547/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Titillium+Web "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Titillium+Web")
It's got an interesting origin, as a class project from a group of students in Italy. It looks great -- original. I wonder if it kerns well.
